welcome_message_body: Welcome to Asheville, where the Blue Ridge Mountains meet a vibrant arts and music scene. Enjoy our charming downtown, craft breweries, and stunning natural beauty as you explore all this unique city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Lennys Grill & Subs
restaurants.description: Lennys Grill & Subs is a sandwich spot located in Asheville.

restaurants.name: Red Stag Grill
restaurants.description: Red Stag Grill is a steakhouse located in Asheville.

restaurants.name: Biscuit Head
restaurants.description: Biscuit Head is a breakfast spot located in Asheville.

restaurants.name: Corner Kitchen
restaurants.description: Corner Kitchen is a café located in Asheville.
restaurants.address: 3 Boston Way (All Souls Crescent), Asheville, NC 28803

restaurants.name: Ichiban
restaurants.description: Ichiban is a sushi restaurant located in Asheville.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Asheville Regional Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Asheville Regional Airport serves all domestic flights operated by American Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Asheville Regional Airport serves all domestic flights operated by Delta Air Lines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
